titleStmt.title: A serious expostulation with E.B. an eminent Quaker about his late breaking, for neer forty thousand pounds. A great part whereof was moneys of the Quakers publique-stock.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication conjectured by cataloger.
A variant has "E.B." instead of "B.E." in the title. Cf. Wing.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library and the Fiends House Library, London.
